name: Antedean
description: The Antedean are a species of amphibious beings known for their cunning and deception.

name: Augments
description: The Augments are a group of genetically engineered humans created through genetic modification.

name: Bajorans
description: The Bajorans are a humanoid species native to the planet Bajor, known for their strong spiritual beliefs and religious practices.

name: Bolians
description: The Bolians are a humanoid species with a distinctive blue complexion and a cranial ridge.

name: Borg
description: The Borg are a cyborg species that seeks to assimilate all other species into their collective.

name: Cardassians
description: The Cardassians are a humanoid species characterized by their ridged foreheads and secretive, militaristic society.

name: Denobulans
description: The Denobulans are a humanoid species known for their diplomacy and medical expertise.

name: Ferengi
description: The Ferengi are a humanoid species known for their greed and mercantile interests.

name: Gorn
description: The Gorn are a reptilian species known for their physical strength and warrior culture.

name: Humans
description: Humans are a humanoid species from Earth, known for their diverse cultures and technological advancements.

name: Klingons
description: The Klingons are a warrior species known for their distinctive cranial ridges and honorable combat traditions.

name: Romulans
description: The Romulans are a humanoid species with pointed ears and a secretive, militant society.

name: Tellarites
description: The Tellarites are a porcine species known for their blunt personalities and negotiation skills.

name: Vulcans
description: The Vulcans are a humanoid species known for their logical minds and controlled emotions.

name: Xindi
description: The Xindi are a group of different species that banded together in a common goal.

name: Yridians
description: The Yridians are a species of humanoids known for their involvement in organized crime and greed.
